import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { SmileOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons'; import { Form, Input, DatePicker, TimePicker, Select, Cascader, InputNumber, Mentions } from 'antd'; const { Option } = Select; const formItemLayout = { labelCol: { xs: { span: 24 }, sm: { span: 6 }, }, wrapperCol: { xs: { span: 24 }, sm: { span: 14 }, }, }; export default function Index() { const [model, setModel] = useState('') const getSelectedModelData = async(value) =>{ try{ const response = await fetch(`http://localhost:8000/data/requests/request_change/${value}`) const res = await response.json() console.log(res) }catch(e){ console.log(e) } } const onSelectModel = e =>{ alert(e) getSelectedModelData(e) } return (
} /> -
) }
